remarks: Lemma for ~ ordtype .  Either the function ` OrdIso ` is an isomorphism onto all of ` A ` , or ` OrdIso ` is not a set, which by ~ oif implies that either ` ran O C_ A ` is a proper class or ` dom O = On ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2015.)
